metadata.name: Dance/No fight
metadata.description:
I hope one day there will be no need of army at any corner of the world. And it will be a better place. 
But now we have to defend this dream. Together. 
And soon we will dance again. Together. 

Glory to Ukrainian Army!
Hold on. We are together ðŸ’›ðŸ’™
Music: The Pump Panel - Re-Mover
